titles.title: Perishable Agricultural Commodities Amendment Act of 1992

To amend the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930, to prevent the imputation to cooperatives of conduct by their members and affiliates for the purposes of the prohibition relating to labeling of certain commodities.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E128)
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Natural Resources.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from USDA.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Perishable Agricultural Commodities Amendment Act of 1992 - Amends the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930 to prevent the imputation of certain member or affiliate conduct to cooperatives.
